text: Oh fairy of Bloo, please grant me my wish.
Grant me strength and wisdom to reforge my life's love for me!
Mr.Blob throws the coin into the fountain.
Upon the fountain, your wishes take flight,
Landed upon our most curious line of sight.
With our powers we've been granted.
We shall grant you a honeymoon most perfected!
Mist surrounds Mr.Blob and transform Blobby town.
I've been bequeathed an idea most ingenious!
